attributes.action: Call a general election, as Conservatives best effort is failing the country
attributes.additional_details: Conservatives have tried and failed, and are no longer representing the majority of the electorate.  Fo rthe sake of our country we need an election to let the people have their say.
attributes.background: Enormous damage to our economy is being done by the current government.  The electorate are suffering as a result of the Conservative lack of consistency and leadership, and all the U-turns.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
